MonsterTrait.Name: Defensive Zone
MonsterTrait.Text: The gearforged templar can make an opportunity attack when a creature enters its reach.

MonsterTrait.Name: Onslaught
MonsterTrait.Text: As a bonus action, the gearforged can make a Shove attack.

MonsterTrait.Name: Multiattack
MonsterTrait.Text: The gearforged templar makes three attacks with its glaive.

MonsterAction.Name: Glaive
MonsterAction.Text: Melee Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d10 + 5) slashing damage.

MonsterAction.Name: Javelin
MonsterAction.Text: Ranged Weapon Attack: +8 to hit, range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d6 + 5) piercing damage.

MonsterTrait.Name: Whirlwind (recharge 5-6)
MonsterTrait.Text: The gearforged templar whirls its glaive in a great arc. Every creature within 10 feet of the gearforged takes 16 (3d10) slashing damage, or half damage with a successful DC 16 Dexterity saving throw.

MonsterTrait.Name: Parry
MonsterTrait.Text: The gearforged templar raises its AC by 3 against one melee attack that would hit it. To do so, the gearforged must be able to see the attacker and must be wielding a melee weapon.
